properties.displayName: UniFi Site Manager - Firmware Update Available
properties.description: Detects when UniFi devices have firmware updates available. Keeping firmware updated is critical for security as updates often contain patches for vulnerabilities.
properties.query:
// UniFi Firmware Update Available Detection
// Author: Fetch Labs (https://sentinel.blog)
let DeviceThreshold = 1;
UniFiSiteManager_Devices_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id
| where isnotempty(updateAvailable)
| summarize 
    DevicesNeedingUpdate = count(),
    DeviceList = make_list(pack(
        "name", coalesce(name, "Unnamed"),
        "model", model,
        "currentVersion", version,
        "availableVersion", updateAvailable,
        "ip", ip
    )),
    Models = make_set(model),
    ProductLines = make_set(productLine)
| where DevicesNeedingUpdate >= DeviceThreshold
| extend 
    TimeGenerated = now(),
    AffectedModels = strcat_array(Models, ", "),
    AffectedProductLines = strcat_array(ProductLines, ", ")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    DevicesNeedingUpdate,
    AffectedModels,
    AffectedProductLines

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: {{DevicesNeedingUpdate}} devices have firmware updates. Models: {{AffectedModels}}. Product lines: {{AffectedProductLines}}.
